Docs.summary: サポートされているイメージの種類に利用可能なカラー パレットを定義します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] image formats support image palettes. However, other image types can be used to define a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette>. Attempting to define a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette> for an unsupported bitmap format does not result in an exception; the designated <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette> is simply ignored.
[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports both custom color palettes and predefined palettes defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalettes> class.
